bioconda.name: bioconductor-pathvar
bioconda.summary: Methods to Find Pathways with Significantly Different Variability

biotools.summary: This package contains the functions to find the pathways that have significantly different variability than a reference gene set. It also finds the categories from this pathway that are significant where each category is a cluster of genes. The genes are separated into clusters by their level of variability.

bioschemas.name: pathVar
bioschemas.summary: This package contains the functions to find the pathways that have significantly different variability than a reference gene set. It also finds the categories from this pathway that are significant where each category is a cluster of genes. The genes are separated into clusters by their level of variability.
